snippet: Brazil's lower house of Congress is likely to vote on a plan to reform the country's pension system in the second half of April, House Speaker Rodrigo Maia said on Friday....

headline.main: Rituals, Wild Animals and a Few Giggles
headline.print_headline: High Priestesses of the Runway Wild

lead_paragraph: Brazil's lower house of Congress is likely to vote on a plan to reform the country's pension system in the second half of April, House Speaker Rodrigo Maia said on Friday.
